publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2557# Johann Lamont: Citizens Advice Bureau, Greater Pollok-That the Parliament welcomes the opening of a Citizens Advice Bureau in Greater Pollok; notes that it has received a remarkable number of enquiries already, 370 in its first month of being open; further notes that local people have come forward to volunteer and currently form 90% of the workforce in the bureau; congratulates Greater Pollok Social Inclusion Partnership and Citizens Advice Scotland on their partnership approach in working together to provide the necessary funding, and believes that the bureau will complement the excellent work of the seven other bureaux in Glasgow in tackling social exclusion through the provision of independent advice, assistance and representation services.

S1M-2557# Johann Lamont: Citizens Advice Bureau, Greater Pollok-That the Parliament welcomes the opening of a Citizens Advice Bureau in Greater Pollok; notes that it has received a remarkable number of enquiries already, 370 in its first month of being open; further notes that local people have come forward to volunteer and currently form 90% of the workforce in the bureau; congratulates Greater Pollok Social Inclusion Partnership and Citizens Advice Scotland on their partnership approach in working together to provide the necessary funding, and believes that the bureau will complement the excellent work of the seven other bureaux in Glasgow in tackling social exclusion through the provision of independent advice, assistance and representation services.
S1M-2557# Citizens Advice Bureau, Greater Pollok (lodged on 18 December 2001) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2557# Citizens Advice Bureau, Greater Pollok (lodged on 18 December 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2557# Citizens Advice Bureau, Greater Pollok (lodged on 18 December 2001) Des McNulty*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2557# Citizens Advice Bureau, Greater Pollok (lodged on 18 December 2001) Robert Brown*, Trish Godman*
S1M-2557# Citizens Advice Bureau, Greater Pollok (lodged on 18 December 2001) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-2557# Citizens Advice Bureau, Greater Pollok (lodged on 18 December 2001) Elaine Smith*
